meta.article_title: September 7, 2020 - Tactics Early In a Match: Explorers and Dominators

tactics_early_in_a_match_explorers_and_d.probleme: Tactically playing early in a match

debutant.description: Feel out the opponent's game and adjust tactics based on this.

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice serves and returns with various speeds and spins.

erreurs_a_eviter.description: Over-adjusting to the opponent's shots and letting them dictate play.
